info.title: Challenge, Support, and Intervention Plan API
info.description:
API for retrieving and managing Challenge, Support, and Intervention Plan (CSIP) relating to a person.

## Authentication

This API uses OAuth2 with JWTs. You will need to pass the JWT in the `Authorization` header using the `Bearer` scheme.

## Authorisation

The API uses roles to control access to the endpoints. The roles required for each endpoint are documented in the endpoint descriptions.

## Identifying the user

The majority of the endpoints in this API require the user to be identified via their username. This is to correctly populate the change history of CSIP records e.g. who created or updated a CSIP record and for auditing purposes. The username is required when the service is called directly by a user or when another service is acting on behalf of a user. The following methods for supplying the username are supported to cater for these scenarios:

1. **Token claim** - The username can be passed in via a `user_name` or `username` claim in the JWT.
2. **Username header** - The username can be passed in via a `Username` header in the request.

The username is taken in priority order from the `user_name` or `username` claim in the JWT if present, followed by the `Username` header if no claim is found.

### 4XX response codes related to username:

- A 400 Bad Request response will be returned if the username cannot be found via any of the above methods.
- A 400 Bad Request response will be returned if the username cannot be found in the user management service.
- A 403 Forbidden response will also be returned if the user identified by the username does not have access to the caseload associated with the person.

get.summary: Retrieve all reference data fo a domain.
get.description:
Get all reference data for a domain e.g. area-of-work

Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN__CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN_UI

parameters.name: includeInactive
parameters.description: Include inactive reference data. Defaults to false

404.description: The reference data associated with this domain was not found.

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.description:
Add a reference data code. Publishes prisoner-csip.reference-data-code-created event

Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN__CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN_UI

404.description: The reference data associated with this domain was not found.

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Retrieve and filter all CSIP records for a prisoner.
get.description:
Returns the CSIP records for a prisoner. Supports log number filtering.

Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN__CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN_UI

parameters.name: logNumber
parameters.description: Filter CSIP records that contain the search text in their Log Number. The search is case insensitive.

parameters.name: createdAtStart
parameters.description: Filter CSIP records that have a created timestamp at or after the supplied time.

parameters.name: createdAtEnd
parameters.description: Filter CSIP records that have a created timestamp at or before the supplied time.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.summary: Create a CSIP record for a prisoner.
post.description:
Create the CSIP record, referral and contributory factors. This starts the CSIP process. Publishes prisoner-csip.csip-record-created and prisoner-csip.contributory-factor-created events

Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN__CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN_UI
* ROLE_NOMIS_CSIP

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

post.summary: Add safer custody screening outcome to the referral.
post.description:
Create the safer custody screening outcome. Publishes prisoner-csip.csip-record-updated event with saferCustodyScreeningOutcomeAffected = true

Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN__CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN_UI
* ROLE_NOMIS_CSIP

409.description: Conflict. The CSIP referral already has a Safer Custody Screening Outcome created.

404.description: The CSIP referral associated with this identifier was not found.

201.description: Safer Custody Screening Outcome added to CSIP referral

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

patch.summary: Update the safer custody screening outcome.

get.summary: Retrieve and filter all CSIP records for prisoners resident in the prison.
get.description:
Returns the CSIP records for prisoners resident in the prison. Supports log number filtering.

Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN__CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN_UI

parameters.name: logNumber
parameters.description: Filter CSIP records that contain the search text in their Log Number. The search is case insensitive.

parameters.name: createdAtStart
parameters.description: Filter CSIP records that have a created timestamp at or after the supplied time.

parameters.name: createdAtEnd
parameters.description: Filter CSIP records that have a created timestamp at or before the supplied time.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The size of the page to be returned

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting criteria in the format: property,(asc|desc). Default sort order is ascending. Multiple sort criteria are supported.

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

get.summary: Get a CSIP record by its unique identifier
get.description:
Returns the CSIP record with the matching identifier.

Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN__CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN_UI

404.description: The CSIP record associated with this identifier was not found.

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

delete.description:
Delete the whole of a CSIP record, including its referral and plan. Publishes prisoner-csip.csip-record-deleted event

Requires one of the following roles:
* ROLE_CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN__CHALLENGE_SUPPORT_INTERVENTION_PLAN_UI

404.description: The CSIP record associated with this identifier was not found.

401.description: Unauthorised, requires a valid Oauth2 token

code.description: The short code for a reference data

description.description: The description for the reference data code

code.description: The short code of a reference data

description.description: The description of the reference data code

listSequence.description: The sequence number of the code. Used for ordering codes correctly in lists and drop downs.

createdBy.description: The username of the user who created the code

modifiedAt.description: The date and time the code was last modified

modifiedBy.description: The username of the user who last modified the code

deactivatedBy.description: The username of the user who deactivated the code

ReferenceData.description: A reference data code to categorise various aspects related to a CSIP record

logNumber.description: User entered identifier for the CSIP record. Defaults to the prison code.

incidentTime.description: The time the incident that motivated the CSIP referral occurred

referredBy.description: The person reporting the incident or creating the CSIP referral.

assaultedStaffName.description: Name or names of assaulted members of staff if any.

otherInformation.description: Any other information about the incident or reasons for CSIP referral.

contributoryFactors.description: Contributory factors to the incident that motivated the referral.

staffInvolved.description: The names of the staff involved in the investigation.

evidenceSecured.description: Any evidence that was secured as part of the investigation.
